dcterms:creator: F. Chollet
dcterms:description: The Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus (ARC) is an AI benchmark designed to evaluate machine learning models on tasks that require abstract reasoning and generalization, particularly focusing on core knowledge priors.
dcterms:title: Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus (ARC)

dcterms:creator: S. Acquaviva
Y. Pu
M. Kryven
C. Wong
G. E. Ecanow
M. I. Nye
T. Sechopoulos
M. H. Tessler
J. B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: The Language-complete Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus (LARC) enriches the ARC tasks with natural-language descriptions, facilitating communication of precise instructions for solving tasks.
dcterms:title: Language-complete Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus (LARC)
mls:task: Abstract reasoning tasks with natural language
